messages.title: Defend & extend our NHS
messages.content: The Tories have let us down in Lancaster, and Morecambe Bay. People have been left waiting more than 4 hours at A&E in the Royal Lancaster Infirmary...

messages.title: Loving our High Streets
messages.content: Like many places, Lancaster has been hit by the casualisation of employment on our high streets with underemployment and insecure work becoming too common...

messages.title: The climate emergency
messages.content: I'm determined to make tackling the climate emergency a top priority. We have seen the power of local communities...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'm committed to scrapping universal credit...
I'm determined to make tackling the climate emergency a top priority...

mentions.candidate: I believe in a different kind of politics and that's why I have worked hard to be deeply embedded within our local community...

politicalExperience.achievements: I have helped secure millions in flood defence funding, defended local services from Tory/Lib Dem cuts, and have been vocal in the fight to protect our NHS.

contactInformation.address: Labour North West, 1 The Plaza, Liverpool, L31DQ
